test_minting_approve_bigMint().notice: Mints a big quantity of ozUSDC (~1M)

test_minting_eip2612().notice: Mints a small quantity of ozTokens using EIP2612

test_redeeming_bigBalance_bigMint_bigRed.notice: From 1M USDC balance, mint 1M and redeem 1M

test_redeeming_bigBalance_bigMint_medium.notice: Minds ~1M of ozUSDC, but redeems a portion of the balance (~700k)

test_redeeming_bigBalance_bigMint_smallR.notice: REFERENCE Mints 1M of ozTokens, then rebalances Uniswap and Balancer pools,  and redeems a small portio of ozUSDC.

test_redeeming_bigBalance_smallMint_smal.notice: From 1M USDC balance, mint and redeem a small part (100 USDC)

test_redeeming_multipleBigBalances_bigMi.notice: This test proves that rebasing algorithm works, and that the difference between token balances is due to imbalance pools after the test swaps

Used quantities like 100 USDC to mint ozUSDC, where redeeming 1 ozUSDC, would be ineligble so the MEV produced is quite lower, proving the efficacy of the  rebase algorithm.  In this test, the "bigMint" is in relation to the amount being redeem (100:1)

documentation.text: Mints a small quantity of ozUSDC (~100)
Mints a big quantity of ozUSDC (~1M)
Mints a small quantity of ozTokens using EIP2612

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract ozIToken,uint256,uint256,address,enum Type) returns (struct RequestType memory,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)

documentation.text:
REFERENCE
 Mints 1M of ozTokens, then rebalances Uniswap and Balancer pools, 
 and redeems a small portio of ozUSDC.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract ozIToken,uint256,uint256,address,enum Type) returns (struct RequestType memory,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)

documentation.text:
Used quantities like 100 USDC to mint ozUSDC, where redeeming 1 ozUSDC, would
 be ineligble so the MEV produced is quite lower, proving the efficacy of the 
 rebase algorithm. 
 In this test, the "bigMint" is in relation to the amount being redeem (100:1)

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract ozIToken,uint256,uint256,address,enum Type) returns (struct RequestType memory,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)

documentation.text: Minds ~1M of ozUSDC, but redeems a portion of the balance (~700k)

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract ozIToken,uint256,uint256,address,enum Type) returns (struct RequestType memory,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "- bal alice oz post-mint - alice & bob same: "

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract ozIToken,uint256,uint256,address,enum Type) returns (struct RequestType memory,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)

documentation.text:
This test proves that rebasing algorithm works, and that the difference
 between token balances is due to imbalance pools after the test swaps

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract ozIToken,uint256,uint256,address,enum Type) returns (struct RequestType memory,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)
function (bytes memory) view returns (struct RequestType memory,uint256[] memory)
function (bytes memory) view returns (struct RequestType memory,uint256[] memory,uint256)
function (enum Type,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256[] memory) view returns (struct RequestType memory)
function (bytes32,address,address,struct IVault.ExitPoolRequest memory) external returns (uint256,uint256[] memory)
function (bytes32,address,address,struct IVault.JoinPoolRequest memory) external returns (uint256,uint256[] memory)
function (struct IVault.SingleSwap memory,struct IVault.FundManagement memory,uint256,uint256) payable external returns (uint256)
